issue.title: [R] Add functionality to allow binding registration with the `pkg::fun` name
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16888](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16888). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Modify `register_binding()` to register 2 identical copies for each `pkg::fun` binding, `fun` and `pkg::fun`. 
- Add a binding for the `::` operator, which helps with retrieving bindings from the function registry.
- Add generic unit tests for the `pkg::fun`  functionality.
